content: The BET999.io Welcome Bonus Package:1st Deposit Bonus333% up to 39,999 B9C lockedMin Deposit $202nd Deposit Bonus333% up to 69,999 B9C lockedMin Deposit $50+ $3 Sports Free Bet3rd Deposit Bonus222% up to 89,999 B9C lockedMin Deposit $1004th Deposit Bonus222% up to 99,999 B9C lockedMin Deposit $200Don't delay and deposit today!We have one of the highest-level referral systems.We have a referral program starting from 50% of referral wager and up to 85%!Daily bonusesAlso, Every user can claim an everyday login bonus after email confirmation.RainsWe have 2 types of Rain: Basic and Diamond.Simple rain is going every 1 hour for users who reached 2 levels (not VIP level, just level).Diamond rain is a random event. Nobody knows when it will start, but the amount of coins in diamond Rain is huge! Users who reached 5 simple levels will be able to catch it!Chat Game BotWe also have a chat game bot that starts the Roll Hunt game and the Guess Lucky Number game! Check it out!GamesFor now, we have a Dice game with advanced modes, a Keno game with 4 levels of risk, and a Limbo game. Over 1000 slot games, tables, live dealers, and other games.Coins we acceptBTC, ETH, USDT, TRX, B9C, B9FDeposit and WithdrawalsAll deposits and withdrawals are instant! But if you have 1 account and not violating the rules all will be OKFaucetThe faucet system is very interesting. After registration you will be able to claim 0.01 USD faucet in every coin 10 times. But every level number of claims is raising.On the weekend facet doubles (0.02 USD)After 5$ worth of deposit, the faucet doubles too! But if it was done on the weekend faucet will be x4 (0.04 USD)Provably FairAll our games are provably fair and can be checked via codeFollow us and keep up with the latest news!Discord - https://discord.gg/PVCp8bwhQV[/url]Facebook - https://[Suspicious link removed]/bet999sMedium - https://medium.com/@bet999Twitter - https://twitter.com/Bet999Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/bet999official/TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@bet999officialYoutube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTsU7YUwfgm76P35vChOKKA

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First of all, i will like to welcome you to the forum, but "The global leader in crypto gambling" tag is a big deception, not to even mention that fact that you copied Betfury's casino design and features, i personally would not trust a casino like this, a lot of red flags and hastiness in developing a casino which leads to poor design and lack of features, or copying designs and features from already existing casino, to me, is a big red flag.Quote from: gunhell16 on November 10, 2022, 04:51:06 AMBut I can't deny that your referral percentage is attractive as well as the faucet features you made compared to betfury.Mate, open your eyes, this might just be a way to lure gamblers in, always remember that "if its too good to be true, then its probably not true", its just like those days of hyip, where you see alot of websites offering very high yield on your investment, only for you to rush in and never come out with your money.
